amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect the benefits of disabled veterans and their survivors, which may not include a chained CPI.

vote.text: Amendment SA 198 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 198 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Sanders.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 198 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 198 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Sanders.
